/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and trucks are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the constant movement and energy of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, gray, and red, painting a picture of a city that is both modern and vibrant.
